Package HMS.Systems

Class StockSystem

java.lang.Object
HMS.Systems.StockSystem
public class StockSystem extends Object
The StockSystem class handles the management of stocks and replenish requests in the system. It provides methods to load, save, and manipulate stock HMS.data, as well as create and update replenish requests.

  • Method Details

    • getStocks

      public static List<Stock> getStocks()
      Returns the list of all stocks in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all stocks

    • getLowLevelStocks

      public static List<Stock> getLowLevelStocks()
      Returns the list of stocks with a stock level below or equal to their low stock alert threshold.
      Returns:
      a list of low-level stocks

    • createReplenishRequest

      public static StockReplenishRequest createReplenishRequest(StockReplenishRequest stockRequest)
      Creates a replenish request for a stock. If a pending request for the same stock already exists, it updates the existing request with the incoming stock level.
      Parameters:
      stockRequest - the replenish request to be created
      Returns:
      the created or updated replenish request

    • updateReplenishRequest

      public static StockReplenishRequest updateReplenishRequest(StockReplenishRequest request)
      Updates an existing replenish request.
      Parameters:
      request - the replenish request with updated details
      Returns:
      the updated replenish request, or null if the request doesn't exist

    • getReplenishRequests

      public static List<StockReplenishRequest> getReplenishRequests()
      Returns a list of all replenish requests that are currently pending.
      Returns:
      a list of pending replenish requests

    • showLowStockItemsAndCreateReplenishRequest

      public static void showLowStockItemsAndCreateReplenishRequest()
      Displays low-level stock items and allows the user to create a replenish request for them. Prompts the user for stock selection and quantity to replenish.

    • printStocks

      public static void printStocks()
      Prints all the stocks in a table format.

    • displayPendingReplenishRequest

      public static void displayPendingReplenishRequest()
      Displays all pending replenish requests in a table format.

    • handleReplenishRequests

      public static void handleReplenishRequests()
      Handles the approval or rejection of a replenish request Prompts the admin to select a request and approve or reject it.

    • saveReplenishRequests

      public static void saveReplenishRequests()
      Saves the list of replenish requests to the storage file.

    • loadStocks

      public static void loadStocks()
      Loads stock HMS.data from the storage file into memory.

    • saveStocks

      public static void saveStocks()
      Saves the list of stocks to the storage file.

    • loadReplenishRequests

      public static void loadReplenishRequests()
      Loads replenish requests from the storage file into memory.

    • getStockById

      public static Stock getStockById(int stockId)
      Retrieves the stock by its ID.
      Parameters:
      stockId - the ID of the stock
      Returns:
      the stock object if found or null if not found
